Parameters: int: Transmission power of Bluetooth LE Advertising, can only be one of @B_android#bluetooth#le#AdvertiseSettings#ADVERTISE_TX_POWER_ULTRA_LOW_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#le#AdvertiseSettings#ADVERTISE_TX_POWER_LOW_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#le#AdvertiseSettings#ADVERTISE_TX_POWER_MEDIUM_E@ or @B_android#bluetooth#le#AdvertiseSettings#ADVERTISE_TX_POWER_HIGH_E@.
setTxPowerLevel(int).Description: Set advertise TX power level to control the transmission power level for the advertising.

Parameters: int: Advertising time limit. May not exceed 180000 milliseconds. A value of 0 will disable the time limit.
Throws: If the provided timeout is over 180000 ms.
setTimeout(int).Description: Limit advertising to a given amount of time.

Parameters: boolean: Controls whether the advertisment type will be connectable (true) or non-connectable (false).
setConnectable(boolean).Description: Set whether the advertisement type should be connectable or non-connectable.

Parameters: int: Bluetooth LE Advertising mode, can only be one of @B_android#bluetooth#le#AdvertiseSettings#ADVERTISE_MODE_LOW_POWER_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#le#AdvertiseSettings#ADVERTISE_MODE_BALANCED_E@, or @B_android#bluetooth#le#AdvertiseSettings#ADVERTISE_MODE_LOW_LATENCY_E@.
setAdvertiseMode(int).Description: Set advertise mode to control the advertising power and latency.
